blocks.content:
#### In 2020 I'm challenging myself to put thoughts to "paper". Although I have never been a _huge_ believer  of random internet blogs, I'm going to try to create just that.

#### I aim to share my learnings and opinions on technology, personal finance, and city-life with whomever is willing to read them. Many of these thoughts have been cultivated through home-education, memories, experiences, and sometimes random notes on my phone when something interesting popped in my head.

#### [Subscribe here](https://dev.us4.list-manage.com/subscribe/post?u=a38ee5cfd956e8a3181e097a9&id=34ae01c4a6 "Mailchimp") to receive an email when I (sporadically) post new articles.
